database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: N-Glycoprotein Surfaceomes of Four Developmentally Distinct Mouse Cell Types - FIbroblasts
entry.description: Using the Cell Surface Capture Technology, the cell surface N-glycoproteomes of three cell lines and one in vitro differentiated cell type representing distinct cell fates and stages in mouse embryogenesis were assessed.

additional_fields.field: A protein modification that effectively replaces a carboxamido group with a carboxyl group, with both a gain of oxygen and loss of a nitrogen and a hydrogen.
